resources.string: My First Week at a Fast Food Restaurant
Type in your name to get started!

string-array.name: intro_explaination
string-array.item: Hi %s! I\'m Scott and I am your supervisor here at Fast Food.
You start work on Monday and have a week probationary period.
Each day you will take responsibility for the hygiene of the restaurant as well as serve customers.
If you mess up, you may have to go back to your previous work... or worse, you could get fired!

string-array.name: hygieneactivity0
string-array.item: Scott has asked you to clean the kitchen floor. Will you do it?
You have cleaned the floor, but it is now wet. Do you bother drying the floor?
Someone slipped and hurt themselves on the wet floor! You are a liability for our restaurant.

string-array.name: hygieneactivity1
string-array.item: Whilst cooking, you dropped a raw burger onto the floor. Do you pick it up?
Do you bin the burger or cook it?
The burger was contaminated from touching the floor and made someone sick! You are a liability for our restaurant.

string-array.name: hygieneactivity2
string-array.item: It is your turn to clean the toilets. Do you refill the soap?
Now that there\'s soap, do you clean the toilets?

string-array.name: hygieneactivity3
string-array.item: The bins are getting full. Do you empty them?

string-array.name: customeractivity0
string-array.item: You are running the drive thru and the customer is difficult to hear. Do you ask them to repeat themselves?
You misheard the customer and now the order is wrong. Are you going to fix it?

string-array.name: customeractivity1
string-array.item: A large order comes in the drive thru. Are you going to ask them to park up and wait?

string-array.name: customeractivity2
string-array.item: A customer asks for extra ketchup when it usually costs money. Do you give it to them for free?

string-array.name: customeractivity3
string-array.item: The customer\'s card gets declined. Do you let them try again?
It declines for a second time. Do you give them free food out of pity?
You did not ask for the manager\'s permission before giving the free food.
